message: No where in the Constitution does it say that electors must vote the way the majority of their state did, otherwise what is even the point of having them. They were created to stop an incompetent candidate from becoming President even if the people voted for him. How many of these electors want history to remember them as the last failsafe against a dangerous man like Trump and they failed to act accordingly?
Have you seen the throwback uniforms?!?..yeesh!!!
Starting of censorship of the press. You, the media gave him a free pass on the way to the presidency. This will be the first of many privileges denied.

What are you saying? Putin will treat Trump like a puppet. Trump just rants on and on. Americans will remember what he said wanting the Russians to hack the emails when going to the polls. You need to ask Trump to show Americans his tax returns. We are entitled to know. Sounds like well he does not want American people to know. Be careful what you wish for.

Writers, scholars and scientists who question the official version of the Holocaust or draw attention to the role played by jews in opening up Europe to Islamic immigration in the first place are thrown in prison.
